itunes:title: #90: 5 Reasons You Need to Apologize
title: #90: 5 Reasons You Need to Apologize
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: When it comes to embodying a Healed and Loved Woman to have healthy relationships, self accountability, honesty, and apologies are part of the deal. In this episode, we explore 5 reasons you may need to be the one who apologizes FIRST. Get Started on...
itunes:summary:
When it comes to embodying a Healed and Loved Woman to have healthy relationships, self accountability, honesty, and apologies are part of the deal. In this episode, we explore 5 reasons you may need to be the one who apologizes FIRST.
